instructions.en: Continue straight to stay on Cool highway
instructions.fi: Jatka suoraan pysyäksesi tiellä Cool highway
instructions.fr: Continuer tout droit pour rester sur Cool highway
instructions.he: המשך ישר כדי להישאר על Cool highway
instructions.it: Continua dritto per stare su Cool highway
instructions.ko: Cool highway 로 계속 직진해 주세요.
instructions.my: Cool highway​​ေပၚတြင္ေနရန္တည္တည့္ဆက္သြာပါ
instructions.nl: Blijf rechtdoor gaan op Cool highway
instructions.no: Fortsett rett frem for å bli værende på Cool highway
instructions.pl: Jedź dalej prosto, aby pozostać na Cool highway
instructions.pt-BR: Continue em frente para manter-se na Cool highway
instructions.pt-PT: Continue em frente para se manter em Cool highway
instructions.sv: Kör rakt fram och fortsätt på Cool highway
instructions.tr: Cool highway üzerinde kalmak için düz devam et
instructions.uk: Продовжуйте рух прямо залишаючись на Cool highway
